value.title: How to create custom color themes - Power BI Tips & Tricks #34
value.excerpt: Do you want to create custom color themes in power bi? value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code.
